law.text: The board shall elect a chairperson, secretary, and treasurer annually, or more frequently if required by the circumstances. The offices of secretary and treasurer may be held by the same person.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 18.
